title: Kourtney Kardashian rocks long tan leather coat as she swings by nighttime church services in LA
text:
Kourtney Kardashian was spotted swinging by nighttime church services in her native Los Angeles on Wednesday.

The 40-year-old reality TV icon wrapped herself up in a camel-toned leather FRAME overcoat and balanced on black heels for her evening of worship.

Sweeping her dark hair into a ponytail, Kourtney could be glimpsed chatting with a male pal as she emerged from her car and headed to church.

Power of prayer: Kourtney Kardashian was spotted swinging by nighttime church services in her native Los Angeles on Wednesday

Her younger sister Kim Kardashian told Vogue last year of her family: 'We don’t share it much, but we’re really religious.'

The sex tape icon added: 'We start our day with a group chat with a Bible verse from my mom, and everyone chimes in on the meaning of it. We are very Christian - and our work ethic and our discipline comes from so many years at Catholic school.'

Kourtney shares three children - Mason, nine, Penelope, seven, and Reign, four - with her dashing ex Scott Disick, 36.

In a recent interview with E! News, she shared that she has changed her attitude to parenting and now wants her children to see her on the job.

'It's interesting because I used to, as a working mom, really try to separate work from my mom time. I recently thought it's a great thing for my kids to be able to see me in working mode,' said Kourtney, who launched her lifestyle brand Poosh this April.

'Even at our Poosh event, I had [Penelope] come. She really wanted to spend the day with me and I thought: "You know what, let her see her mom in action."'

Kim infamously accused Kourtney of being workshy on a 2018 episode of their reality series Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

'We are very Christian': Her younger sister Kim Kardashian told Vogue last year of her family: 'We don’t share it much, but we’re really religious'

In a legendary outburst, Kim raged: 'Maybe if you had a f***ing business that you were passionate about, then you would know what it takes to run a f***ing business, but you don't, so don't even act like you know what I'm talking about!'

Kim dismissed Kourtney as 'the least exciting to look at' in the family, saying: 'She doesn't do s***. She doesn't know what it's like to actually have f***ing work to do.'

Kourtney and Scott broke up in 2015 but have maintained an amicable co-parenting relationship, even holidaying together with their children.

In recent times their family life has included Lionel Richie's 21-year-old daughter Sofia, whom Scott has been dating for two years now.
